AttackerCapabilities: Ability to navigate through web application

Steps.Description: The attacker attempts to login as admin using the default password 'admin'.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the default password may not have been changed.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker enters 'admin' as the password when trying to login.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully logs in as the admin user.

Steps.Description: The attacker navigates to the 'simple quiz' section of the web application.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the flag is located in the 'simple quiz' section.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker clicks on the 'simple quiz' section.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker successfully accesses the 'simple quiz' section.

Steps.Description: The attacker finds the flag within the 'simple quiz' section.

StepDetails.Hypothesis: The attacker believes that the flag is present within the 'simple quiz' section.
StepDetails.Action: The attacker locates the flag within the 'simple quiz' section.
StepDetails.Result: The attacker finds the flag: flag{th3_an5w3r_w4s_HSCTF_0bvi0us1y}
